channel.title: 508 Disconnecting issue?
channel.description:
Every time I load a 508 source, I load it with a Client, it works perfectly; when I log-in it just disconnects over and over and over.
Can anyone help me? If it's a cache error or need a cache, can you hook me up?
Thanks, AerialX!
